trends: There have been 151 other sightings in San Diego
There were no other sightings in San Diego on or around August 27th 2009
divs: sighting detailsjust before 1940hrs i went outside my condo to see if our hottest day of the year had started to cool. in the same location as i reported a sighting on 7\15\09 i spotted what i thought was a satellite traveling from se to nw high in the evening sky. it was still light enough that i could not see any stars at that time. as i watched it slowly move, it suddenly turned to the west and increased acceleration until it disappeared. i continued looking at the sky and within the next five minutes two f-18s from miramar flew overhead about 30 - 45 seconds apart at an estimated altitude of 1.0 to 1.5k feet heading out to the east desert training area. very loud! i continued to sky-watch and about 5 minutes later i spotted a similar satellite object flying from e to w at a very slow speed. after it moved about three fists at arms length distance, the object hovered and then moved in an irregular circle for at least a minute. it suddenly disappeared and i did not see it again. it's a question if this was the same object being seen twice or two different objects. no way to tell.
Object Flight Path: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
